text:
NEWS
from
Corporation for Public Broadcasting
555 Madison Avenue
New York, New York 10022
(212) 582-2020
(J. C. Dine)
FOR RELEASE
MONDAY, MARCH 3, 1969
EDUCATIONAL TELEVISION STATIONS PROGRAM SERVICE
RECEIVES $125,000 CORPORATION FOR PUBLIC BROADCASTING GRANT
New York, March 2 â€” A $125,000 Corporation for Public
Broadcasting grant to Educational Television Stations
Program Service was announced today by John W. Macy, Jr.,
Corporation President.
"The expanded programming made possible by this
grant," Mr. Macy said, "represents our firm belief in the
importance of helping provide the most diversified programming
possible for public television."
David Leonard, Director of the Program Service,
estimated that the number of new television programs distributed
to the nation's public television stations by the ETS Program
Service will be nearly doubled as a result of this grant.
(MORE)
